ygData.subject: Re: RE: skill cap + grow up all of you
ygData.msgSnippet: I am not insulting anyone, i just got angry when Diablokilr said the got pissed off by a guy with a different opinion than his own. I am not saying one is
ygData.messageBody:
I am not insulting anyone, i just got angry when Diablokilr said the got
pissed off by a guy with a different opinion than his own. I am not saying
one is right about the skill cap or the other, i have NO idea myself, i
started working on my skill at lvl 40, am 50 now and only at skill 104.

I just think that getting "pissed off" because someone is doubting your
information is immature and not necessary in a list like this, and to use
his "time spent" in the list as an argument to right? well...

Just dont want to see it again :)

-Sandortien
